result.title: A Tribute to Dennis Ritchie Contest
result.content:
Hello, Everyone.

Today is 9th of September. On this very day in 1941, a great computer scientist was born who popularized computer programming all over the world. His name is Dennis Ritchie, creator of C programming language and legendary UNIX operating system. His contribution in the field of Computer Programming is inexpressible. We, the members of the largest Programming Community of Bangladesh on Facebook, remember him and his contribution with reverence.

In memory of this great Scientist, we are going to arrange a Programming Contest titled A Tribute to Dennis Ritchie Contest at the Bangladeshi contest hosting platform Toph.

We would like to welcome you to join this contest on 14th of September at 20:00 PM (BST). The contest will be similar to ACM-ICPC style contest and the duration will be about 4 – 5 hours. The difficulty of the problem-set will be mostly equivalent to CodeForces Div2 standard.

Contest Title: A tribute to Dennis Ritchie Contest
Contest Link: https://goo.gl/XaVuip
 Start Time: 14th September at 8 PM (BST)
 Duration: 4 — 5 Hours
 Rank List: ACM – ICPC Style.

I would like to introduce the Problem setters. The setters are: mihassan, I_See_You , Mukit09 , sha-1 , Zeronfinity , Last_Hope_of_theromeo421, rofi93, hasan_cse91, ghazanfar_iiuc, and ssavi .

The Admin Panel of the প্রোগ্রামিং প্রব্লেম ( Programming Problem in Bengali ) would like to thank all of the setters of the contest and Mahmud Ridwan for giving us the privileges to host the contest at Toph.

We hope to see you all on the Leaderboard on 14th September.

GL and HF . Thank You.
